frontend-test-infrastructure.summary: Successfully fixed frontend test infrastructure - syntax errors resolved, proper test utilities created

syntax_errors_fixed: JSX syntax error in setup.ts - replaced with React.createElement calls
Fixed import paths in test files
Resolved auth-related variable references in useAGUI hook
configuration_updates: Updated vite.config.ts to remove invalid package reference
Added proper auth context mocking in setup.ts
Created enhanced test utilities with React Testing Library
Fixed all TypeScript const assertions in test files
remaining_issues: Input elements disabled in tests due to connection state
Some accessibility tests failing due to focus management
Performance tests have overlapping act() warnings
recommendations: Enable test components to bypass authentication checks
Mock WebSocket connection state for interactive testing
